statements: SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE trial_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, trial_id FROM patients WHERE trial_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE trial_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY diagnosis, patient_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND diagnosis IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_age ASC, patient_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, trial_id FROM patients WHERE patient_age <= 25 AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY trial_id, patient_name;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, trial_phase FROM trials WHERE sponsor = 'Company A';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trial_name, trial_phase, start_date, sponsor FROM trials WHERE trial_phase = 'Phase 3' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age <= 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN trials t ON p.trial_id = t.trial_id WHERE t.sponsor = 'CompanyX';
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY diagnosis;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, weight FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT trial_name, end_date, trial_id FROM Trials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, weight FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, patient_id, trial_id, enrollment_date FROM TrialParticipants ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrial WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT site_name, city, country FROM TrialSite WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT patient_id, trial_id, result FROM TrialData WHERE result = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, start_date FROM ClinicalTrial WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, city, country FROM TrialSite WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM TrialData WHERE patient_id = 1 AND trial_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT id, name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT doc_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage >= 50;
SELECT doc_name, specialty, location FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, t.trial_name, pt.enrollment_date FROM patients p JOIN patient_trials pt ON p.id = pt.patient_id JOIN trials t ON t.trial_id = pt.trial_id;
